verbs.description: [ARG0: Swiss pharmaceutical giant Novartis] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that its top lawyer is retiring over a deal to hire Trump 's personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , as a consultant] .
